mapper.update: UPDATE experiment_project SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, level = #{level}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT pt.id FROM project_team pt JOIN project_team_member ptm ON pt.id = ptm.team_id WHERE ptm.student_id = #{studentId}
SELECT student_id FROM user WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM experiment_report WHERE teacher_name = #{teacherName} AND status = 'SUBMITTED'
SELECT score FROM experiment_report WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND score IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE experiment_project SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, principle = #{principle}, purpose = #{purpose}, method = #{method}, steps = #{steps}, category = #{category}, level = #{level}, collaboration_type = #{projectType}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, screenshot = #{screenshot}, scene_data = #{sceneData}, experiment_params = #{experimentParams}, scene_json_path = #{sceneJsonPath} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT category AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM experiment_project GROUP BY category

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM experiment_project WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY name

SELECT p.name AS name, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN pr.progress = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) AS value FROM experiment_project p JOIN project_progress pr ON p.id = pr.project_id GROUP BY p.id, p.name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT p.name AS name, COUNT(DISTINCT pr.student_id) AS value FROM experiment_project p JOIN project_progress pr ON p.id = pr.project_id GROUP BY p.id, p.name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5
